name: Grand Hyatt Mumbai

reviews.text: I have recently stayed for two nights at Grand Hyatt Mumbai. Its an excellent business hotel conveniently located very nearto the domestic terminal and not far from new financial district BKC. Hotel has excellent restaurants especially China House, Fifty five east and Gourmet shop. Club floor lounge is very nice and so is the spa. Overall very enjoyable stay.
reviews.title: Excellent Business Hotel

reviews.text: Great service and security. Well equipped workout facility. Nice pool area. Just minutes from your airport gate but very quiet. Never heard aircraft noise..
reviews.title: Recent Stay

reviews.text: Italian restaurant was good.. Wine a bit overpriced..
reviews.title: Quiet and luxury

reviews.text: Good breakfast..
reviews.title: Excellent Choice When Visiting Mumbai

reviews.text: This hotel highly recommended for business meetings and special events, the hotel has a lovely and huge reception lobby; in addition to a shopping centre and three restaurants, the rooms are modern and good size, however there some renovation noisy work on the 4th floor, the hotel will be my second preferable option for my next visit.
reviews.title: Too much neighbour noise on too many occasions

reviews.text: Stayed at the hotel for 4 nights on business and thought the staff & catering were very good, definitely recommend China House for dinner (bellini & peking duck were amazing). The Pool & spa facilities were also good if you get the chance to use them. The only fault to the hotel is the poor soundproofing of the bedrooms, it was a common comment from my colleagues who also had broken sleep during their stay so maybe a hotel to avoid if your a light sleeper.
reviews.title: Good service, excellent food but poor sound proofing in bedroom

reviews.text: I stayed for just one day and it was a wondereful experience. Everything, starting from check-in, in-room services, restaurant, food quality and check-out processes were very good. The room given to me had a door leading to the next room and the noise from the adjacent room guests at 1am was disturbing though. Overall, a very good experience. Breakfast was excellent.
reviews.title: Excellent stay

reviews.text: Being a Mumbai resident, I have been a regular visitor to this hotel. I stayed here twice over last one month - for attending two back to back conferences. This hotel is conveniently located off the Western Express Highway. The domestic and international airport terminals are easily accessible. Business district – Bandra Kurla Complex is nearby. Mumbai shopping and nightlife hub of Bandra is in close proximity.
reviews.title: Business & Conference Hotel

reviews.text: The hotel is spread over large area and provides a general sense of calm and serenity. The hotel staff members are generally good, but I did notice that in the corridor or lobby they just pass by and do not greet the guest.
reviews.title: Excellent Location & Fantastic Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms and bathrooms are comfortable and are of decent size. I had opportunity to dine in all their outlets – Indian, Chinese, Italian & coffee shop. The food quality and options are excellent. Breakfast spread meets international standards whilst providing lots of local delicacies.
reviews.title: Stay Here If You Want No Trace of Actually Being in India

reviews.text: Spent 4 days her over a weekend so got the chance to see a bit more of the hotel than I did last time. Most of what the hotel does is 5 star. The rooms are quiet and spacious. The service is generally excellent. I love the breakfasts here - fantastic choice and lots of freshly cooked food. I also had room service food which was some fo the ebst I have eaten. The gym is great as is the pool. The location near the airport is reason why lots of people choose the hotel, although it it is then quite way to south Mumbai. The niggles - the lobby is overwhelming - not at all welcoming. The layout of the building, with its long corridors and the peeling grey vinyl cladding occasionally strike you as more prison-like than hotel-like. The spacious rooms have a tiny amount of wardrobe space - a couple with 2 suitcases are going to be really stuck! The mini-bar is locked and no-one offered a key. But overall I had a pleasant stay and would be quite happy to stay here again.
reviews.title: Mostly Grand

reviews.text: The Hyatt Grand is well located in respect to the airport and even south Mumbai if you choose your journey time carefully, any problems with this hotel are minor and all of the staff go out of their way to assist you, even if occasionally they need reminding that when they say they will do something right away that it is what you expect, not to have to ask again one or two hours later.
reviews.title: A Five star oasis in Bombay with some minor issues

reviews.text: I have stayed previously in 2009, so knowing the restaurants are very good and get busy, I pre-booked the Indian, Chinese and Italian restaurants, last night we tried the Indian food restaurant and it was again excellent, tonight the Chinese with similar expectations.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are in very good condition with only minor issues such as sliding doors that don't align very well, my daughter is staying in the next room, she has twice been locked out due to a faulty door lock, the second occasion because the key was programmed incorrectly to show her checking out today, 12 July 2013, which is a bit careless and caused her to call me during my business meeting, which was an unexpected and unwelcome interruption at the time!
reviews.title: Terrible terrible experience!! not a 5star hotel at all

reviews.text: On the subject of relatively minor issues, I had tried to book one of the boardrooms for a business meeting today, I emailed the concierge a few days in advance and never received a reply, I asked on arrival, not possible to arrange!, they did check with the business centre who could fit me in but insisted on charging me, there was no movement on this which I think is completely unreasonable based on the fact that they did not reply to the email request as far as I can see, very petty attitude to take, they did go out of their way to make an area of the club lounge available, which although very much appreciated, was just not the same as a private meeting room.
reviews.title: Impeccable service!

reviews.text: The Grand Hyatt Mumbai has been hotel this year so far. The staff made the stay so enjoyable and comfortable. The room was easy to work in and I'm trying to replicate aspects of the bathroom for home.
reviews.title: Fantastic service!

reviews.text: We had a suite, the rooms are not too big, but well set up. The balcony option was amazing! The service is prompt and a very clean property. We had to attend a wedding function at the Hyatt, and the food, hall, service etc was amazing. Surprisingly the food was really good!
reviews.title: Good service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: An injury in the group, we required a doctor and medicines - the hotel was prompt and helpful, this felt nice.
reviews.title: Nice Place to Stay

reviews.text: The external walls need to be maintained however, the plaster was seen coming out when we were chilling in the balcony.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.text: Location is not too great, but if you wish to visit the suburbs and the city then this is a good place to stay for a couple of days.
reviews.title: stay at hyatt for a conference

description: Grand Hyatt Mumbai is located in the centre of Mumbai, India. More than a hotel, it is a multi-dimensional lifestyle complex located just 10 minutes from Mumbai’s domestic airport and 20 minutes from the international airport and in close proximity to Bandra-Kurla complex, Mumbai’s rapidly developing business district. The hotel features luxurious accommodation, contemporary serviced apartments, dining & entertainment options, spa, recreation & fitness facilities, conference & exhibition spaces & an international shopping plaza.
